inbodydescription.para: < Test if there will be room for the message
< Try to add any inactive messages
< Grab the parent object (will be one of the four ScreenMessageStyle areas)
< See if we will cause an overflow
< Remove the top message if it's been up for at least 0.35 seconds with pending messages (or whatever the max time is)
< Remove a message - this will decrease the size of the list, so decrement our counter
